hi there Im a former UMB student with a blinking big gripe about this blinking website the blinking blinking ads on every blinking page are a blinking nightmare PERIOD I wonder if there isnt an equally lucrative because I realize what blinking advertisers pay is in direct proportion to how little blinking aesthetic sensitivity they have method for you to keep the blinking ship afloat and not give me a blinking headache while I try to read PERIOD Stop the blinking Its bugging me as I write PERIOD

Thank you for your blinking consideration PERIOD Paula Carleton Evans

UMass Bostons independent studentrun newspaper
